stories.title: Jennifer Scheurle steps down as IGDA group chair amid abuse allegations

stories.text:
There was a product (I believe it was written in Haskell) that was posted here few months ago. It was for product managers and I think it was using JIRA to showcase the abilities (with plans to add more tools). It was like a dashboard, showing all useful JIRA stuff on one page.

I have searched and tried all possible words I can think of, no luck.

Does anyone remember what it was?
stories.title: Ask HN: One page dashboard Haskell product that was posted here
